document.full_text: as china's population grows older, the government may relax the one-child policy that has lowered the country's birthrate, but that may not greatly change what is now established practice.
document.title: as china ages, birthrate policy may prove difficult to reverse
lines_and_colors: as china's population grows older, the government may relax the one-child policy that has lowered the country's birthrate, but that may not greatly change what is now established practice.
